Material used.Description: Simulations were performed on the protein structure in a solvent environment.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_001126112.3:c.248G>A resulted in significant structural destabilization.

Technical replicates.Description: Each simulation was run three times to account for variability.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type protein sequence was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: A non-variant protein sequence was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Root Mean Square Deviation (RMSD) and Radius of Gyration analysis

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: RMSD values less than 1.5 Angstroms and radius of gyration below 100 Angstroms

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: RMSD values greater than 3 Angstroms and radius of gyration above 150 Angstroms
